name: Report Card
query:
SELECT 
    u.student_name as "Student Name::200",
    t.course as "Course::200",
    u.total_score as "Total Score:Int:80",
    u.grade as "Grade::80" 
FROM 
	(SELECT course,name from `tabAssessment Plan` WHERE name 
		IN ( SELECT assessment_plan from `tabAssessment Result` )) t
JOIN 
	(SELECT student_name,assessment_plan,total_score,grade from `tabAssessment Result`) u 
WHERE 
	t.name = u.assessment_plan;
